definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pour out (NH id., pour, cast (metals, Pi. make libation; Ph. [[נסך]] cast gold or iron Lzb:323 f.; Targum [[נְסַח]] make libation; Syr. nsak pour out; Ar. nasaka, orig. be-pour, water Nö:ZMG xii (1887), 719 (rare), usu. worship Lane:3032 (cf. RS:Sem. i. 213; 2d ed. 229), i.e. pour out blood of victim, pour out wine We:Heid. 2, 114, 118, 142; —
pour out, c. [[עַל]] (the spirit of deep sleep) Is 29:10.
pour out libations, c. acc. [[נֶסֶךְ]] Ex 30:9 (P); [[מַסֵּכָה]] Is 30:1; [[יַיִן]] Ho 9:4.
cast metal images, c. acc. [[פֶּסֶל]] Is 40:19, Is 44:10.

definitions.title: Piel
definitions.body: Impf. [[יְנַסֵךְ]] 1Ch 11:18 pour out as libation, c. acc. [[מַיִם]] + [[ליהוה]] (= 2Sa 23:16 Hiph.).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 mpl. [[הִסִּכוּ]] Je 32:39; Impf. 3 ms. [[וַיַּסֵח]] Ge 35:14 + 2 t.; 1 s. [[אַסִּיח]] Ps 16:4; 3 mpl. [[וַיַסִּיכוּ]] Ez Eze 20:28; Imv. [[הַסֵח]] Nu 28:7; Inf. abs. [[הַסֵּיח]] Je 44:l7; [[הַסֵח]] Je 7:18 + 3 t.; cstr. [[לְהַסֵח]] Je 44:19, Je 44:25 (Kö:i. 309);—pour out libations, c. acc. [[נֶסֶךְ]] Ge 35:14 (E), 2Ki 16:13, Nu 28:7 (P), [[מַיִם]] 2Sa 23:l6 [[ליהוה]]; elsewhere, [[נְסָכִים]] to other gods Je 7:18, Je 19:13, Je 32:29, Je 44:17, Je 44:18, Je 44:19, Je 44:19, Je 44:25, Ez Eze 20:28, Ps 16:4.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יֻסַּךְ]] be poured out, Ex 25:29, Ex 37:16, of holy wine, c. [[בְ]] of vessels.
